alert.note: Alert for Fountain; Montgomery (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 1:48PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Fountain and west central Montgomery Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 148 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Veedersburg, or 19 miles west of Crawfordsville, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southern Fountain and west central Montgomery Counties, including the following locations... Waynetown, Newtown, Mellott, Hillsboro, Yeddo and Wallace. This includes Interstate 74 between mile markers 9 and 25. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
